channel.title: Having trouble getting my server online!
channel.description: Hi guys, I ran my server on Hamachi for a long time. Before I buy a VPS I want a full public access, however, I need to get my portfowarding to work. In my situation I CANNOT portforward, realisticly, But I can use uTorrent. I can connect, But other people cannot? and I followed tutorial and what not, but can I get some help? Thanks. Alex.

item.title: Having trouble getting my server online!
item.dc:creator: @RSPSColossus RSPSColossus
item.description:
@RSPSColossus wrote:

I turned off my fire wall, Still No luck, My no-ip is set up right and all.
http://www.canyouseeme.org/
says my port isnt open though? Is that a issue, or is that just how its meant to be?
This is so stressful. I’ve spent over a month into this source and I’d hate for it too fail.
Thanks for the all the feed back.
-Alex.

Read full topic
item.source: Having trouble getting my server online!

item.title: Having trouble getting my server online!
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

As luna-scape already said, VPS’s are already portfowarded, you just need to add the port into the firewall’s exceptions.

Read full topic
item.source: Having trouble getting my server online!

item.title: Having trouble getting my server online!
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

If you can’t portforward with uTorrent, then you can’t. If you can’t portforward, then I suggest waiting for somone to respond to what I said, or you can just google it.

Read full topic
item.source: Having trouble getting my server online!

item.title: Having trouble getting my server online!
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Utorrent is crap, anyways try turning off ur firewall or make specific rules for the ports so ur firewall doesnt block the connections.

Btw VPS is auto portforwarded. (If not ask the company, they will do it for you.)

Read full topic
item.source: Having trouble getting my server online!

item.title: Having trouble getting my server online!
item.dc:creator: @RSPSColossus RSPSColossus
item.description:
@RSPSColossus wrote:

runescape sucks:

I think you can portforward your VPS, so that’s not a problem. I could be wrong, wait for somone who has a VPS

So should I just wait to buy a VPS and go from there? Or is there a way I can fix it now with the uTorrent Port Forward?

Read full topic
